title: BONUS: Movie Mike's Movie Podcast: Fact Checking Movies Based On True Stories + Bad Boys for Life Review + Things That Only Happen In Movies
itunes:title: BONUS: Movie Mike's Movie Podcast: Fact Checking Movies Based On True Stories + Bad Boys for Life Review + Things That Only Happen In Movies
description:
Bobby wants to share one of his favorite new podcasts with you! It's Mike D's from the show's podcast called "Movie Mike's Movie Podcast". Here is a BONUS episode for you to check out and if you enjoy it....give him a follow and subscribe. Just search "Movie Mike" wherever you listen to podcasts or CLICK HERE


On this episode, Mike researched movies based on true stories to determine how much actually happened in real life vs. what was made up strictly for the movie. This episode covers The Revenant, Remember the Titans, Catch Me If You Can, Walk the Line, The Blindside, and The Texas Chainsaw. Mike also gives his review of ‘Bad Boys for Life’ starring Will Smith and Martin Lawrence. Plus his Top 5 List of Things that happen in movies but NEVER in real life such as a police officer taking a civilian's car to use in a car chase.


New Episodes Every Monday!




Follow Mike on Instagram: @mikedeestro

Follow Mike on Facebook: @mikedeestro

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
